评论详情: This was a gift for my friend and she is typically a small/medium so I bought the medium. Considering the fact that it’s a baby-tee it is true to size. It’s just a little bit smaller everywhere (sleeve length, torso length, etc.), just as it should be! The colors are spot on and the graphic itself is purposefully a little pixelated. Great pick!!
I got this for my friend as a Christmas gift, and she loves it! The material of the shirt is soft and the picture of the cat is good quality. She also loves baby tees so it fit her well.
So tiny, but very very SOFT. Gift for my daughter & she loves it.
very tight.. prob go a size higher
Way too small and the print quality is not good.  I never wore it after trying it on once.
Color is much darker than picture. Color is similar to eggnog. The cat looks like it was printed off an old model printer. Do not recommend.
Perfect baby-tee for that early 2000’s look.
Not great quality or print but is ok. You get what you get for the price 🤷‍♀️
Much more yellow than white/cream. Very cheap feeling and thin. Runs small. Not satisfied whatsoever

But, this is supposed to be a baby tee. Still Probably my new favorite shirt.
The graphic on this is not that good, however it is cheap so it makes sense.
Horrible t-shirt, it didn't even have a tag, a yellowish color, and it's super small... it doesn't match the size.

such a cute design, but top is very thin, a lot more cropped than expected, and tight around the shoulders and bust. print is ok, about as focused as it appears in the listing but certainly not a crisp image. i sized up in hopes that it would be a good baby-tee length but it was somehow too tight on top and too loose around the stomach/underbust area. such a shame :( i really wanted to love it but there's too many issues to justify keeping
I get that is states "baby tee" but I sized up 3x and its still basically a crop top.  The item also is very sheer, my 10 year old had her n!ps peeking through.

评论概述: Runs small, sheer, low quality for $15.
评论详情: The quality is not good for $15. $15?! It’s worth maybe $5. I bought a medium, I have 34C bust and a slimmer waist. And it runs tighter. It might fit you better if you’re super slim on the arms and shoulders and bust, for a medium. It’s not very stretchy and it is sheer. The graphic is much larger and lower quality than the image shows. I wouldn’t recommend anyone to buy this shirt unfortunately, even if it’s cute on the picture :/
It was the same color as my skin. weird material
My daughter loves this top for her back to school fit. She is usually an xs/s for tops but needed the M in this.  It's super soft.
